data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Feng, Zhao, Likun, Zhang, Chao (2018): Cladolasmaailaoshan, a new species of the genus Cladolasma Suzuki, 1963 from China (Opiliones, Nemastomatidae, Ortholasmatinae). ZooKeys 748: 11-20, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.748.23273, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.748.23273
